name: donjolly
text: My question is: will Nice Pete feel weirdo jealousy?

text: A comment left by vampilehunter was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, Norsef, riotdejaneiro, Spoon, 7th_shot, n00b, farqussus, habnabit, likeiwassaying, ravindra108, Lokiamis, Doc_Rostov)

name: nyu
text: Do you not remember Nice Pete appointing Ray God for saving him?

name: soticoto
text:
And besides... since when has death actually finished off an Achewood character?

Molly was dead for several centuries then came back to life again.

text: Even if it was an appropriate reference to the words of Ray?

name: saurkraus
text: I think Nice Pete was spared, due to the counsel of Roast Beef. How come I can remember that but I can't remember to do my essays?

text: If it wasn't for Raost Beef, Ray would have gone all pro ice on Nice Pete.

text: In Ray's defense, he was in a raw situation.

text: pfff - pat is clearly a jerk in this

name: tekende
text: They're both rude, but Pat is an idiot. Therefore Rod has the upper hand.

name: soticoto
text:
Pat is a dick.
Not the same thing.

name: shutup_shutup
text: While Pat is being a jerk, it's only because he is continuing to exist, and he is a jerk.  But chubbies for recognizing that vegulons got a raw deal.

text: Vegulons? This seems strange to me.

name: shutup_shutup
text: http://achewood.com/index.php?date=01232006

name: i_love_kate
text: Not the response I was looking for. Come on, Assetbar. You can do this. Restore my faith in humanity.

name: shutup_shutup
text: I'm ... I'm sorry?

text: Why isn't Rod Huggins wearing a shirt? Or is that integral to the essence of The Huggins?

text: A comment left by katal was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, pityparty, riotdejaneiro, Carpetbag, ESwrathwright, shammack, Semiquaver, dropkickpikachu, Audhumla, niggar, lizjones, wehavemagnums)

text: I agree about puns, but somehow, it WORKS here.  It's so perfect.

name: niggar
text: What happened to this storyline.

name: overmedicated
text: One of the Phillipe Phridays clears things up to a certain degree i.e. can-rocking.

name: ford
text:
I hereby decree that all dude-on-dude sex havings will now be referred to as "Can-rocking"

"Jim totally can-rocked Phil"

"I am a horny gay fellow and could do with a can-rocking"

"The wife let me can-rock her on friday"

name: waldo913
text: The last one only works if your wife is a dude though, right?

name: tekende
text: One time I was going to IHOP with some friends and one of them said he would buy my dinner, as I was light on funds. He joked that I was going to put out, to which I responded that I would rock his can. A horrified expression slowly took shape on his face.

name: saint
text: is...is that a squirrel outline on Pat's head? What did I miss there?!?

name: peppermint
text:
Male pattern baldness.

Yes, I know that makes no sense. shut up

name: hikikomori
text:
More like.. male-pattern.. crop circles.

In some alien tongue, that particular sign on the back of Pat's head means "hey look this guy is a total dick ".

name: kazad
text: Hey, it looks kind of like a pinned-on yarmulke!

name: godfatherofsouls
text: I AM WITH STUPID

name: mortshire
text: after 4/10's brilliance, i'm a little let down.

name: billyamericana
text: I doubt the cheddar available there would have much cheese in it at all, actually.

text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by equinn2006, mistlethrush, davidadam)

text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Nurdbot, goatmasterflash, Overmedicated, foolio, TTAGXAMM, mugi, YossarianLives, SeanBad, echidnaboy, vincentkv, aperson)

name: catachresis
text: Boor/bore cleverness almost saves it. Still, this arc leaves me colder than a crispy Brahma.

name: snowman
text: man, to each his own, but this arc made me laugh so much.

name: tombsgrave
text: Wait a tic, is Rod still naked?

name: someone3
text:
to be fair, roast beef has almost always been naked, and until he got neutered ray was always naked, which by the way is probably why he got fat and started wearing the thong, and till the pool party pat has been naked...

i read this comic too much...

oh well, can't wait till the new strip!!!

name: dovey
text: Y'know, I never thought about it that way, Ray getting fat and wearing the thong because he got neutered. Chubby for the deep thought.

name: stuart
text: RAY. WAS. NOT. NEUTERED.

name: madnes
text: He can still sport wood!

name: stuart
text: HELL YES!

name: blarghamagarky
text: Please sir what is your avatar. It looks like live action Sailor Scouts which I would need to see.

name: spinynorman
text:
Yeah, it's that mixed with a commercial about making your dick big.

Man, I just said that. I feel like I'm about to go into post traumatic shock.

name: alzuna
text: Look up Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon on youtube, if nothing has changed someone has all of the episodes uploaded...it is...madness.

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Milton Bradley Games presents Twister: An artifical system that creates needless suffering!

Two people in a relationship who view each other as projects is the real artifical system that creates needless suffering.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: The twister line and the florist line make this one for me. I'd love to see Rod Huggins and Beef in a sass-off.

name: zedpower
text: I originally read that as "ass-off". It was utterly horrifying.

name: mountaindewtab
text: we are all boors

name: i_love_kate
text: I really like Rod Huggins' character here. Topless dining aside, that is, because I just consider that the height of bad grace.

name: agentj
text: Imagine Solomon Burke (or thus the Blue Brothers) performing Everybody Needs A Project...

name: daidai
text: I must say...I'm not a fan of puns.

name: gouldgonewild
text: Well, puns told me that they don't like you either.

name: daidai
text: Yeah, well I'm gonna fucking kill puns.

name: alzuna
text: Woah, woah, that went to a bad place. Puns probably has a family and (the rest of this comment has been removed due to extreme ridiculousness).

name: rowboat
text: Too bad.

name: tttt2
text:
this is just a brilliantly executed comic

nothing else to say

name: gouldgonewild
text: I have to agree with catachresis up there, and say that the bore/boor thoughts are so cleverly executed, it makes me want to punch a baby

name: mr_lostman28
text:
I too have recently come upon describing things others would simply deem "good" with unecessary violent imagery.

For example, "God damn! That bacon cheeseburgers so good I'm gonna strangle a kitten!"

name: wonelove
text:
So Pat's a dick. Oh well,
everyone needs a project.

name: ted0phile
text: It almost seems like I'm the only one here who was amused by the idea of 'Rhubarb Loins' as a nickname.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i don't get it. is the cheddar melted on top of the cobbler?

this for some reason is very interesting to me and i wish to try it sometime.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i can seriously see this thing as being really good.

name: rowboat
text: It's wonderful.

name: tekende
text: People eat apple pie with cheese on top, and that would be a pretty similar thing. I'm not a fan, but other people like it.

name: dusty
text: If you were to unwrap the pattern of Pat's hair, it would look like a silhouette of a raw butchered chicken, complete with the guts-hole and that bone that sticks up in the middle of it.

name: panamajack
text: This strip has one of the most sitcom-y punchlines, but I like it. It shows Onstad's range.

name: greenkoolayd
text: so basically, they have nothing in common except for a gay boner for each other?  talk about shallow...

name: atypicaloracle
text: ... Is Rod still naked from the waist up at the restaurant?

name: deusoma
text: He totally is. This seems unusual to me. I wonder if he's still wearing the towel under the table.

name: duperando
text: Rod isn't wearing a shirt... is he?
